corepack_lineage.upgrade_reason: Refined staged engines into bounded slices; enabled safe auto-promotion for top two engines; staged others with hard guards.

ContextMemoryEngine.why_staged: needs additional validation with real project file scans

daily_commands.mb:ingest: Ingest all newly uploaded deltas/packs; slice; gate; ship CorePack vNEXT.
daily_commands.mb:os-audit: Read-only archaeology of uploaded legacy OS/pack archives; extract missing concepts; ship report.
daily_commands.mb:refine-staged: Run refinement pass on staged engines to reduce risk and increase net benefit; ship delta+report.
daily_commands.mb:status: Show active/staged engines and last ingest decisions.

stop_rules: If an operation would require multi-step user instructions, convert to autonomous execution or refuse as noncompliant.
Never claim access to phone filesystem; only /mnt/data and user-provided uploads.
